p: The search was performed by keywords such as diabetes or hyperglycemia, Boswellia, frankincense, olibanum, boswellic acid, elevated BP or HTN, hypotensive or antihypertensive, DL, and metabolic syndrome using Google Scholar, Scopus, and Medline databases. In fact, in the current research, most of the papers about the effects of Boswellia on metabolic disorders have been precisely evaluated. To better review, irrelevant or duplicated papers have been disregarded. Publications have been specified from their admission up to August 2020.
